Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Grootegeluk_Coal_Mine. Coordinates are for the Grootegeluk Coal Mine, which is part of the Grootegeluk Medupi Expansion Project. Web search geocoded. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grootegeluk_Coal_Mine. The Grootegeluk Medupi Expansion Project (GMEP) is part of the Grootegeluk coal mine, which is actively supplying coal to the Medupi power station

web_search_companies.notes: Exxaro Resources is both the owner and operator of the Grootegeluk coal mine and the GMEP.
